description: Poor connectivity in North Manchester suburban areas
details: Residents in northern suburban areas have significantly reduced access to central services and employment opportunities.

description: Limited evening services in South-East communities
details: Off-peak and evening services are insufficient in south-eastern communities, limiting access to leisure and shift-work opportunities.

description: Inadequate cross-town connections between eastern and western areas
details: Direct connections between eastern and western communities are limited, resulting in excessive journey times and transfers.

description: Limited accessibility for mobility-impaired passengers at older stations
details: Many older stations lack full accessibility features, creating significant barriers for mobility-impaired passengers.

description: Infrequent connections to hospital facilities from southern communities
details: Southern communities have limited direct transport links to major healthcare facilities, increasing journey times for medical appointments.
